json.description:
쿠팡은 고객 만족을 실현하기 위해 존재합니다. 고객들이 "쿠팡 없이 어떻게 살았을까?"라고 물을 때, 쿠팡은 주어진 사명을 이루어 가고 있다는 확신을 가집니다. 쇼핑과 식사를 비롯한 고객들의 라이프스타일 전반을 보다 편리하게 만들겠다는 단 하나의 목표에 전념하며, 쿠팡은 수백만 달러 규모의 이커머스 산업 전체의 혁신을 선도하고 있습니다. 쿠팡은 가장 빠른 속도로 성장을 이루고 있는 이커머스 기업 중 하나로, 국내 커머스 시장에서 독보적인 위치를 점하며 고객들로부터 두터운 신뢰를 얻고 있습니다.

쿠팡은 세계적인 대형 상장 기업임에도 스타트업의 유연한 문화를 유지하고 있다는 점에 자부심을 느낍니다. 스타트업 문화는 쿠팡이 설립 당시 지니고 있었던 민첩함을 계속 유지하며 끊임없이 새로운 서비스를 출시하고 사업을 확장할 수 있도록 하는 쿠팡의 성장 동력입니다. 쿠팡의 모든 직원들에게는 사업가 정신을 가지고 새로운 혁신과 이니셔티브를 좇을 기회가 주어집니다. 업무에 뛰어들어 결과를 만들어내는 대담함은 쿠팡이 일하는 방식의 본질입니다. 쿠팡에서 여러분은 자기 자신과 동료들, 팀, 그리고 회사 전체가 날마다 성장하는 모습을 보게 될 것입니다.

쿠팡의 모든 직원들은 커머스의 미래를 구축한다는 쿠팡의 사명을 다하기 위해 헌신하고 있습니다. 우리는 고객의 어려움을 해결하고, 통념과 관습에 도전하며, 가능성의 한계를 확장합니다. 항상 깨어 있는 최첨단의 초연결 하이테크 환경에서 놀라운 업무 경험을 쌓기 원한다면, 지금 쿠팡에 합류하세요.

해당 포지션은 쿠팡애즈(Coupang Ads)가 "리테일 미디어 분야에서 가장 신뢰받는 광고 매체가 된다"는 사명을 달성할 수 있도록 쿠팡애즈의 Data Insights 조직 내에서 중대한 역할을 수행하게 됩니다.

직무 소개:

쿠팡애즈의 Senior Data Analyst 로서 담당하게 될 주요 업무는 다음과 같습니다.

쿠팡이 소유한 고유 데이터를 활용하여 상품 리서치로부터 인사이트를 도출, 다양한 상품 카테고리 및 시즈널 이벤트와 관련된 쇼핑 트렌드 분석
해당 인사이트가 내부 이해관계자, 온라인 웨비나 및 오프라인 행사에 참석한 외부 관계자에게 효과적으로 전달되고 Coupang Ads 웹사이트에 게시될 수 있도록 스토리텔링을 활용
광고주들이 가장 필요로 하는 인사이트가 무엇인지 파악하고, 광고주와의 의사소통 시 Sales 팀의 해당 인사이트 활용도를 증대하기 위해 내부 이해관계자와 협력
지식 및 모범 사례 공유, 공동 프로젝트 진행을 위해 소속 팀 내 애널리스트 및 여타 조직과 효과적으로 협력

자격 요건:

수학, 통계 등 관련 전공에서 학사 이상의 학위 보유
5년 이상의 데이터 분석 및 실무 경력 보유
SQL + (R 혹은 Python)를 활용한 데이터 가공/추출/분석/리포팅 능력 보유
다양한 분석 기법을 활용하여 가설을 수립 및 검증하고, 도출된 결과를 바탕으로 논리적 추론 및 인사이트를 도출하여 문제를 해결해본 경험 보유
여러 유관 부서와 협업하거나 직접 수행한 분석의 결과를 바탕으로 데이터 기반 커뮤니케이션 및 제안 등의 액션을 취함으로써 프로젝트를 이끌어 본 경험 보유

우대 사항:

데이터 시각화 툴, 특히 Tableau를 활용해본 경험 보유
데이터 분석을 바탕으로 비즈니스 컨설팅을 진행해본 경험 보유
비즈니스 영어 의사소통 능력 보유
스크립트 언어(Python 등) 혹은 통계 및 수학 소프트웨어(R, SAS, Matlab 등) 활용 경험 보유

채용절차 및 안내사항

전형절차
서류전형 - 전화면접 -대면면접 – 최종 합격
전형절차는 직무별로 다르게 운영될 수 있으며, 일정 및 상황에 따라 변동될 수 있습니다.
전형일정 및 결과는 지원서에 등록하신 이메일로 개별 안내드립니다.
참고사항
본 공고는 모집 완료 시 조기 마감될 수 있습니다.
지원서 내용 중 허위사실이 있는 경우에는 합격이 취소될 수 있습니다.
취업 보호 대상자(보훈대상자, 장애인 등)는 관련 법률에 따라 채용우대를 받을 수 있습니다.
개인정보 처리방침
쿠팡그룹은 입사지원자 개인정보 처리방침(아래 링크)에 따라 귀하의 개인정보를 수집하여 처리합니다.
https://rocketyourcareer.kr.coupang.com/privacy-policy
서류반환 정책
본 고지는 『채용절차의공정화에 관한 법률』 제11조 제6항에 따른 것입니다.
당사 채용에 응시한 구직자 중최종 합격이 되지 못한 구직자는 『채용절차의 공정화에 관한 법률』에 따라 제출한 채용서류의 반환을 청구할 수 있음을 알려 드립니다. 다만, 홈페이지 또는 전자우편으로 제출된 경우나 구직자가 당사의 요구 없이 자발적으로 제출한 경우에는 그러하지 아니하며, 천재지변이나 그 밖에 당사에게 책임 없는 사유로 채용서류가 멸실된 경우에는 반환한 것으로 봅니다.
위2항 본문에 따라 채용서류 반환 청구를 하는 구직자는 채용서류 반환청구서 [채용절차의 공정화에 관한 법률 시행규칙 별지 제3호 서식]를 작성하여 당사 이메일(recruitingops@coupang.com)로 제출하면, 제출이 확인된 날로부터 14일 이내에 지정한 주소지로 등기우편을 통하여 발송해 드립니다. 이 경우 등기우편요금은 수신자 부담으로 하게 되오니 유념하시기 바랍니다.
당사는 위2항 본문에 따른 구직자의 반환 청구에 대비하여 채용 여부가 확정된 날로부터 180일간 구직자가 제출한 채용서류 원본을 보관하게 되며, 그때까지 채용서류의 반환을 청구하지 아니할 경우에는 『개인정보 보호법』에 따라 지체 없이 채용서류 일체를 파기할 예정입니다.
채용 및 업무 수행과 관련하여 요구되는 법령상 자격이 갖추어지지 않은 경우 채용이 제한될 수 있습니다.

Coupang exists to fulfill customer satisfaction. When customers say, "How did we ever live without Coupang?", we know that we are fulfilling our mission. With a single obsession to make customers' shopping, dining, and overall life more convenient, Coupang is leading the innovation of the entire e-commerce industry worth hundreds of millions of dollars. Coupang is one of the fastest-growing e-commerce companies, and has established a unique position in the domestic commerce industry and customer trust.

Coupang prides itself on being a global large-scale listed company based on a startup culture. This is the driving force behind our growth, as we maintain the agility we had when we were founded, and continue to launch new services and expand our business. All employees at Coupang are given the opportunity to have an entrepreneurial spirit and pursue new innovations and initiatives. The boldness to jump into work and achieve results is the essence of how Coupang works. At Coupang, you will see yourself, your colleagues, your team, and the entire company grow every day.

Every employee at Coupang is dedicated to Coupang's mission to create the future of commerce. We solve customer problems, challenge conventional ideas and conventions, and push the boundaries of what's possible. If you want an amazing work experience in an always-on, cutting-edge, high-tech, hyper-connected world, join Coupang today.

This position is to take on a high-impact role within the Data Insights org of Coupang Advertising and to helps us deliver on our team's mission to "Be the go-to source for advertising effectiveness in retail media".

Duties:

As Senior Data Analyst at Coupang Ads, your main responsibilities are the following:

Use Coupang's proprietary data to surface insights on product research and shopping trends related to different product categories and/or seasonal events
Use storytelling to effectively communicate the insights to internal stakeholders, to external participants of online webinars, of offline events and/or when publishing the insights to the Coupang Ads website
Partner with internal stakeholders for identifying the top insight needs of our advertising clients as well as for driving adoption of the insights by Sales for their client-facing conversations
Effectively collaborate with analysts in your immediate team as well as the broader org for knowledge/ best practice sharing as well as joint projects

Qualifications:

A bachelor's degree or higher in relevant majors such as mathematics, statistics, etc.
More than 5 years of data analysis and practical experience
Someone who is skilled in data processing/extraction/analysis/reporting using SQL + (R or Python)
Someone who has experience in establishing and verifying hypotheses using various analysis techniques, solving problems by making logical inferences and deriving insights based on the results
Someone who has experience leading projects by collaborating with various related departments and taking actions such as data-based communication and proposals based on their own analysis results

Preferred Qualifications:

Those who have experience using data visualization tools, in particular Tableau
Anyone with experience in business consulting based on data analysis
Someone who can speak business English
Experience with scripting languages (e.g. Python) or statistical/mathematical software (e.g. R, SAS, Matlab, etc.) experience

[Recruitment Process and Others]

Recruitment Process:

Application Review - Phone Interview - Onsite Interview - Offer
The recruitment process may be different depending on the job and may be changed due to scheduling and circumstances.

Others:

This job post may be closed early if all openings are filled.
If there is any false information in the application, the offer may be cancelled.
Veteran status or disability will not result in any disadvantages in the recruitment process.
Interview schedules and the results will be informed to the applicant via the e-mail address submitted at the application stage.

[Privacy Notice]

Your personal information will be collected and managed by Coupang as stated in the Application Privacy Notice located below.
https://www.coupang.jobs/kr/privacy-policy/

[Document Return Policy]

This notification is given pursuant to Article 11 (6) of the Fair Hiring Procedure Act.
A job applicant, who has applied but not been finally selected for a position at Coupang (the "Company"), may request the Company to return his/her hiring documents submitted pursuant to the Fair Hiring Procedure Act. However, this will not apply where the hiring documents were submitted via the website of the Company or e-mail, or where the job applicant submitted those documents voluntarily without a request from the Company. In addition, if the hiring documents were destroyed due to a natural disaster or any other reasons not attributable to the Company, such documents will be deemed to have been returned to the job applicant.
A job applicant who wishes to request the return of his/her hiring documents pursuant to the main sentence of paragraph 2 above should fill out a "Request for Return of Hiring Documents" [Annex Form No. 3 in the Enforcement Rule of the Fair Hiring Procedure Act] and submit the request to the Company by email ( recruitingops@coupang.com ) In such case, within fourteen (14) days from the date of identifying the receipt of the request, the Company will send the hiring documents to the job applicant's designated address via registered mail. Please be informed that the job applicant is required to pay the postage on the registered mail.
In preparation for a job applicant's request for the return of hiring documents pursuant to the main sentence of paragraph 2 above, the Company shall retain the original hiring documents submitted by the job applicant for 180 days from the completion of the recruiting process. If no request is made until the end of this period, all of his/her hiring documents will be destroyed immediately in accordance with the Personal Information Protection Act.

json.positionName: Senior Data Analyst (Ads Sales Strategy & Ops)
json.description:

직무 소개:

Coupang Ads의 Senior Data Analyst로서 담당하게 될 주요 업무는 다음과 같습니다.

광고 목표달성에 필요한 사업적인 데이터 분석 업무를 수행하고 유의미한 인사이트를 도출하여 사업 방향성 제시.
가설 수립 및 검증을 통해 전체적인 데이터 분석을 리드하여, 리더십 및 세일즈와의 커뮤니케이션을 통해 영업의 병목현상 해결 및 개선 방향 제시.
분석을 통해 비지니스 이슈를 파악하고 원인을 데이터에 기반하여 찾고 이를 통한 액션 플랜 제안.
분석 대시보드 및 리포트 작성과 유지관리.

자격 요건:

수학, 통계 등 관련 전공에서 학사 이상의 학위 보유
3년 이상의 데이터 분석 및 실무 경력 보유
SQL + (R 혹은 Python)를 활용한 데이터 가공/추출/분석/리포팅 능력 보유
다양한 분석 기법을 활용하여 가설을 수립 및 검증하고, 도출된 결과를 바탕으로 논리적 추론 및 인사이트를 도출하여 문제를 해결해본 경험 보유
여러 유관 부서와 협업하여 본인의 분석결과를 바탕으로 데이터 기반의 커뮤니케이션 및 제안 등 액션까지 프로젝트를 주도적으로 이끌어본 경험 보유
빠르게 변화하는 업무 환경에서 우선순위를 지정하고, 효과적인 결과를 작성하여 대응이 가능하신 분 (효과적인 멀티태스킹 능력은 매우 중요합니다.)

우대 사항:

데이터 시각화 툴, 특히 Tableau를 활용해본 경험 보유
Workflow/Task Scheduler (e.g. airflow), Big data query engines (e.g. Hive, Presto, Spark), data pipeline (ETL)등 활용 경험 보유
비즈니스 영어 의사소통 능력 보유

채용절차 및 안내사항

전형절차
서류전형 - 전화면접 -대면면접 – 최종 합격
전형절차는 직무별로 다르게 운영될 수 있으며, 일정 및 상황에 따라 변동될 수 있습니다.
전형일정 및 결과는 지원서에 등록하신 이메일로 개별 안내드립니다.
참고사항
본 공고는 모집 완료 시 조기 마감될 수 있습니다.
지원서 내용 중 허위사실이 있는 경우에는 합격이 취소될 수 있습니다.
취업 보호 대상자(보훈대상자, 장애인 등)는 관련 법률에 따라 채용우대를 받을 수 있습니다.
개인정보 처리방침
쿠팡그룹은 입사지원자 개인정보 처리방침(아래 링크)에 따라 귀하의 개인정보를 수집하여 처리합니다.
https://rocketyourcareer.kr.coupang.com/privacy-policy
서류반환 정책
본 고지는 『채용절차의공정화에 관한 법률』 제11조 제6항에 따른 것입니다.
당사 채용에 응시한 구직자 중최종 합격이 되지 못한 구직자는 『채용절차의 공정화에 관한 법률』에 따라 제출한 채용서류의 반환을 청구할 수 있음을 알려 드립니다. 다만, 홈페이지 또는 전자우편으로 제출된 경우나 구직자가 당사의 요구 없이 자발적으로 제출한 경우에는 그러하지 아니하며, 천재지변이나 그 밖에 당사에게 책임 없는 사유로 채용서류가 멸실된 경우에는 반환한 것으로 봅니다.
위2항 본문에 따라 채용서류 반환 청구를 하는 구직자는 채용서류 반환청구서 [채용절차의 공정화에 관한 법률 시행규칙 별지 제3호 서식]를 작성하여 당사 이메일(recruitingops@coupang.com)로 제출하면, 제출이 확인된 날로부터 14일 이내에 지정한 주소지로 등기우편을 통하여 발송해 드립니다. 이 경우 등기우편요금은 수신자 부담으로 하게 되오니 유념하시기 바랍니다.
당사는 위2항 본문에 따른 구직자의 반환 청구에 대비하여 채용 여부가 확정된 날로부터 180일간 구직자가 제출한 채용서류 원본을 보관하게 되며, 그때까지 채용서류의 반환을 청구하지 아니할 경우에는 『개인정보 보호법』에 따라 지체 없이 채용서류 일체를 파기할 예정입니다.
채용 및 업무 수행과 관련하여 요구되는 법령상 자격이 갖추어지지 않은 경우 채용이 제한될 수 있습니다.
Company Introduction:

We exist to wow our customers. We know we're doing the right thing when we hear our customers say, "How did we ever live without Coupang?" Born out of an obsession to make shopping, eating, and living easier than ever, we are collectively disrupting the multi-billion-dollar commerce industry from the ground up and establishing an unparalleled reputation for being leading and reliable force in South Korean commerce.
We are proud to have the best of both worlds — a startup culture with the resources of a large global public company. This fuels us to continue our growth and launch new services at the speed we have been at since our inception. We are all entrepreneurial surrounded by opportunities to drive new initiatives and innovations. At our core, we are bold and ambitious people that like to get our hands dirty and make a hands-on impact. At Coupang, you will see yourself, your colleagues, your team, and the company grow every day.
Our mission to build the future of commerce is real. We push the boundaries of what's possible to solve problems and break traditional tradeoffs. Join Coupang now to create an epic experience in this always-on, high-tech, and hyper-connected world.

Responsibilities:

As a Data Analyst at Coupang Ads, you will be responsible for the following:

Perform various analysis and create clear and structured deliverables to clearly communicate meaningful insight to a non-technical audience.
Automated KPI's to measure sales productivity, key advertising trends to drive revenue.
Look into current gaps and bottleneck in Sales action and provide improvement direction by data-driven.
Create and on-going maintenance of analytics dashboards or reports.

Basic Qualifications:

A bachelor's degree or higher in relevant major such as mathematics, statistics, etc.
More than 3 years of data analysis and practical experience
Skilled in data processing/extraction/analysis/reporting using SQL + (R or Python)
Experience in solving problems by establishing and verifying hypotheses using various analytical techniques and deriving logical inferences and insights based on the results
Experience in collaborating with various relevant teams and leading projects with data-based communication and proposals based on your own analysis results
Ability to meet tight deadlines, prioritize workload and achieve effective results in fast-paced and dynamic environment; effective multi-tasking skills are vital.

Preferred Qualifications:

Experience in using data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power-BI)
Experience in using workflow/Task scheduler (e.g. airflow), Big data query engines (e.g. Hive, Presto, Spark), data pipelines (ETL)
English proficiency

[Recruitment Process and Others]

Recruitment Process:

Application Review - Phone Interview - Onsite Interview - Offer
The recruitment process may be different depending on the job and may be changed due to scheduling and circumstances.
Others:
This job post may be closed early if all openings are filled.
If there is any false information in the application, the offer may be cancelled.
Veteran status or disability will not result in any disadvantages in the recruitment process.
Interview schedules and the results will be informed to the applicant via the e-mail address submitted at the application stage.

[Privacy Notice]

Your personal information will be collected and managed by Coupang as stated in the Application Privacy Notice located below.
https://www.coupang.jobs/kr/privacy-policy/

[Document Return Policy]

This notification is given pursuant to Article 11 (6) of the Fair Hiring Procedure Act.
A job applicant, who has applied but not been finally selected for a position at Coupang (the "Company"), may request the Company to return his/her hiring documents submitted pursuant to the Fair Hiring Procedure Act. However, this will not apply where the hiring documents were submitted via the website of the Company or e-mail, or where the job applicant submitted those documents voluntarily without a request from the Company. In addition, if the hiring documents were destroyed due to a natural disaster or any other reasons not attributable to the Company, such documents will be deemed to have been returned to the job applicant.
A job applicant who wishes to request the return of his/her hiring documents pursuant to the main sentence of paragraph 2 above should fill out a "Request for Return of Hiring Documents" [Annex Form No. 3 in the Enforcement Rule of the Fair Hiring Procedure Act] and submit the request to the Company by email ( recruitingops@coupang.com ) In such case, within fourteen (14) days from the date of identifying the receipt of the request, the Company will send the hiring documents to the job applicant's designated address via registered mail. Please be informed that the job applicant is required to pay the postage on the registered mail.
In preparation for a job applicant's request for the return of hiring documents pursuant to the main sentence of paragraph 2 above, the Company shall retain the original hiring documents submitted by the job applicant for 180 days from the completion of the recruiting process. If no request is made until the end of this period, all of his/her hiring documents will be destroyed immediately in accordance with the Personal Information Protection Act.

*Yole Group* is an international company, recognized for its expertise in the analysis of markets, technological developments and supply chains, as well as the strategy of key players in the semiconductor, photonic and electronic sectors. Yole Group’s business is based on daily interactions with a network of major operators in these industries, built on mutual trust over the years.

*JOB DESCRIPTION & MAIN TASKS*

Our activities and reputation have grown considerably in recent years throughout the world and more specifically in Asia. Today, we are looking for a *Senior Technology & Market Analyst* position to help us further develop our *memory activities* by performing technology, market, business and strategic analysis.

You will work in close collaboration within the Memory team, part of the Semiconductor, Memory & Computing division as well as take part in the projects of the other divisions. You will report directly to the division’s director.

*Location*: The position is based in Seoul, South Korea (applicants from Taiwan and Japan are welcomed).

Regular business trips in Asia and once a year in Europe are expected.

*As a Senior Technology & Market Analyst, you will be responsible for:*

* *Overseeing *technology and industry insights from device (DRAM, NAND, NOR, 3D NAND …) to memory storage modules (SSD, DIMMs …) and their interfaces
* *Collecting and analyzing data* from different sources according to our internal methodologies, to get an overview of market trends, supply chain and technology developments and trends
* *Understanding *the impact of the emergence of new or improved technologies in various applications
* *Executing *business, marketing, technology and strategic *analysis *within a given timeframe and budget
* Participating in the establishment and structuration of commercial offers
* *Creating and managing *long-term *relationships *with customers, and answering clients’ inquiries
* Intervening as an expert in dedicated *events worldwide* (international conferences and workshops)

*PROFILE*

* University Degree (Bachelor, Master, Engineering, PhD) in a semiconductor, nanotechnologies, microelectronics, electronics (or equivalent) or related field is mandatory
* A significant experience of minimum 4/5 years in the memory industry (market intelligence, product management, business development …) is mandatory
* A first experience in Europe could be a real plus
* Strong interest in business, market strategy and pricing
* Good understanding and knowledge of the key players and semiconductor ecosystem
* Required English level: minimum CECR - C1
* Good knowledge of data modelling
* Strong presentation skills
* Positive team spirit

*RECRUITMENT PROCESS*

At Yole Group, we are committed to offering every candidate a transparent, smooth and humane recruitment experience. That's why we share the various stages of the process with you in advance, so that you can prepare for it with serenity.

The recruitment process will take place in three main stages. First of all, a ten-minute pre-qualification stage will be organized over the phone with a recruiter, to verify certain key elements of your application.

You will then be invited to a one-hour videoconference interview with the Group's recruitment manager. The purpose of this meeting is to gain a better understanding of your background and motivations, and to answer any questions you may have.

If this first interview is positive, a second interview is arranged with the team manager, to discuss the technical and operational aspects of the position, as well as the specific challenges associated with the proposed tasks.

The final stage is a face-to-face interview on our company's offices. You'll meet the team you'll be joining. On this occasion, you'll be asked to prepare a powerpoint to introduce yourself and share a significant project you've worked on. You'll also have the opportunity to talk with team members. This meeting is essential, as it will allow you to project yourself into your future working environment and to check, together, that your expectations match our company culture, on both a professional and human level.

If you're hired, you'll receive individualized support to help you settle in, familiarize you with your working environment and meet the key people you'll need to get your new job off to a good start.

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent
Status: Cadre

Pay: 82,370,000원 - 205,925,000원 per year



Experience:
* memory industry: 4 years (Required)

json.description:
Date: Aug 3, 2025

Location: Pyeongtaek, Gyeonggi, KOR, Humphreys, Korea, Republic of

Company: HII's Mission Technologies division

Requisition Number: 23240

Required Travel: 0 - 10%

Employment Type: Full Time/Salaried/Exempt

Anticipated Salary Range: $62,079.00 - $86,000.00

Security Clearance: TS/SCI

Level of Experience: Mid HI

This opportunity resides with All-Domain Operations (ADO), a business group within HII’s Mission Technologies division. All-Domain Operations comprises multi-domain operations, platforms and logistics, and intelligence operations.

HII designs, develops, integrates and manages the sensors, systems and other assets necessary to support integrated ISR operations and accelerated decision-making. With data fusion and mission management capabilities for the Department of Defense, the combatant commands and the intelligence community, HII advances the mission around the globe.

Meet HII’s Mission Technologies Division
Our team of more than 7,000 professionals worldwide delivers all-domain expertise and advanced technologies in service of mission partners across the globe. Mission Technologies is leading the next evolution of national defense – the data evolution - by accelerating a breadth of national security solutions for government and commercial customers. Our capabilities range from C5ISR, AI and Big Data, cyber operations and synthetic training environments to fleet sustainment, environmental remediation and the largest family of unmanned underwater vehicles in every class. Find the role that’s right for you. Apply today. We look forward to meeting you.

To learn more about Mission Technologies, click here for a short video: https://vimeo.com/732533072

Summary

HII-Mission Technologies is seeking a Target Automation Specialist to support the United States Forces Korea (USFK), Assistant Chief of Staff, J2 (ACofS, J2) JIOC-K in their mission to provide timely intelligence to Commander, USFK and Combined Forces Command, the combined battle staff, and war fighter component commanders!

The JIOC-K's efforts focus on detecting enemy threats, managing intelligence, Intelligence, Surveillance, and Reconnaissance (ISR) activities, analyzing enemy actions and information to determine enemy's probable courses of action.

The overall analytic effort strengthens Defense Intelligence and provides relevant, timely, objective, and cogent all source Defense Intelligence to the Commander and other users, and transforming theater intelligence activities to better leverage the capabilities of the theater and global intelligence communities and safeguard United States personnel and interests within the Korea Theater of Operations (KTO). Come join our growing team today!

What you will do
Serves as SME for Target Automation, such as JTT, NPW, BDART, DASH and MIDB; updating databases, products, shared directories and data formats on multiple networks
Provides expertise of the Joint Targeting Toolbox (JTT), using detailed understanding between JTT and MIDB (and follow on systems) and command and control utilities like Joint Automated Deep Operations Coordination System (JADOCS)
Maintains JTT and trains personnel on the use of JTT
Ensures program conforms to DoD target automation requirements and advises on target automation
In addition to targeting automation, provides knowledge management for the Targeting enterprise
Creates solutions on SIPRNET and JWICS for file sharing/file management that allow geographically dispersed organizations to quickly and efficiently share large files
Understands various collection platforms, explores new data sources, builds effective queries, and combines information from disparate sources including SIGINT, GEOINT, OSINT, and MASINT
Validates information and applies client tradecraft to build assessments for targeteers, warfighters, senior policy makers, internal client publications, and US IC-wide products
Installs new software releases, system upgrades, performs patch evaluation, installs patches and resolves software related problems on all supported operating systems, database systems, and application software deployed
Provides on-going support of systems that ensure the client’s business cycles will not be impacted during upgrades or maintenance
Optimizes and tunes server OS and database performance; documents system configurations
Maintains server, database, application, and network security
Writes, revises, tests, documents and implements server-based procedures as required
Troubleshoots and resolves operating system, storage, and database problems
Monitors system logs, performance reports, and disk space
Represents the customer as the Technical SME at all technical working groups and functional or technical requirements boards, including those systems and applications being developed by host nation for use in the combined environment
Manages the USFK exercise server
Manages access to automation tools and coordinate with system engineers to ensure optimal uptime of USFK targeting systems
Additional duties as assigned or required
What we are looking for
0 years experience with Bachelors in related field; or High School Diploma or equivalent and 4 years relevant experience
Able to surge support during 2 exercises per year
Clearance: Must possess and maintain a TS/SCI clearance, with the continued ability to obtain a Poly
Bonus points for...
Bachelors with 8 years of experience
Recent applicable experience within the last 2 years
Intelligence experience and/or operation support in Korea or other active theaters
Experience with the bi-lateral (ROK-US) Korean environment
Familiar with the Status of Forces Agreement (SOFA)
Physical Requirements
May require working in an office, industrial, shipboard, or laboratory environment. Capable of climbing ladders and tolerating confined spaces and extreme temperature variances.

HII is more than a job - it’s an opportunity to build a new future. We offer competitive benefits such as best-in-class medical, dental and vision plan choices; wellness resources; employee assistance programs; Savings Plan Options (401(k)); financial planning tools, life insurance; employee discounts; paid holidays and paid time off; tuition reimbursement; as well as early childhood and post-secondary education scholarships. Bonus/other non-recurrent compensation is occasionally offered for qualified positions, and if applicable to this role will be addressed by the recruiter at the screening phase of application.

Why HII
We build the world’s most powerful, survivable naval ships and defense technology solutions that safeguard our seas, sky, land, space and cyber. Our workforce includes skilled tradespeople; artificial intelligence, machine learning (AI/ML) experts; engineers; technologists; scientists; logistics experts; and business administration professionals.

Recognized as one of America’s top large company employers, we are a values and ethics driven organization that puts people’s safety and well-being first. Regardless of your role or where you serve, at HII, you’ll find a supportive and welcoming environment, competitive benefits, and valuable educational and training programs for continual career growth at every stage of your career.

Together we are working to ensure a future where everyone can be free and thrive.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, physical or mental disability, age, or veteran status or any other basis protected by federal, state, or local law.

Do You Need Assistance?
If you need a reasonable accommodation for any part of the employment process, please send an e-mail to buildyourcareer@hii-co.com and let us know the nature of your request and your contact information. Reasonable accommodations are considered on a case-by-case basis. Please note that only those inquiries concerning a request for reasonable accommodation will be responded to from this email address. Additionally, you may also call 1-844-849-8463 for assistance. Press #3 for HII Mission Technologies.

Come join our growing team today!

What you will do

  • Serves as SME for Target Automation, such as JTT, NPW, BDART, DASH and MIDB; updating databases, products, shared directories and data formats on multiple networks
  • Provides expertise of the Joint Targeting Toolbox (JTT), using detailed understanding between JTT and MIDB (and follow on systems) and command and control utilities like Joint Automated Deep Operations Coordination System (JADOCS)
  • Maintains JTT and trains personnel on the use of JTT
  • Ensures program conforms to DoD target automation requirements and advises on target automation
  • In addition to targeting automation, provides knowledge management for the Targeting enterprise
  • Creates solutions on SIPRNET and JWICS for file sharing/file management that allow geographically dispersed organizations to quickly and efficiently share large files
  • Understands various collection platforms, explores new data sources, builds effective queries, and combines information from disparate sources including SIGINT, GEOINT, OSINT, and MASINT
  • Validates information and applies client tradecraft to build assessments for targeteers, warfighters, senior policy makers, internal client publications, and US IC-wide products
  • Installs new software releases, system upgrades, performs patch evaluation, installs patches and resolves software related problems on all supported operating systems, database systems, and application software deployed
  • Provides on-going support of systems that ensure the client’s business cycles will not be impacted during upgrades or maintenance
  • Optimizes and tunes server OS and database performance; documents system configurations
  • Maintains server, database, application, and network security
  • Writes, revises, tests, documents and implements server-based procedures as required
  • Troubleshoots and resolves operating system, storage, and database problems
  • Monitors system logs, performance reports, and disk space
  • Represents the customer as the Technical SME at all technical working groups and functional or technical requirements boards, including those systems and applications being developed by host nation for use in the combined environment
  • Manages the USFK exercise server
  • Manages access to automation tools and coordinate with system engineers to ensure optimal uptime of USFK targeting systems
  • Additional duties as assigned or required

What we are looking for

  • 0 years experience with Bachelors in related field; or High School Diploma or equivalent and 4 years relevant experience
  • Able to surge support during 2 exercises per year
  • Clearance: Must possess and maintain a TS/SCI clearance, with the continued ability to obtain a Poly

Bonus points for...

  • Bachelors with 8 years of experience
  • Recent applicable experience within the last 2 years
  • Intelligence experience and/or operation support in Korea or other active theaters
  • Experience with the bi-lateral (ROK-US) Korean environment
  • Familiar with the Status of Forces Agreement (SOFA)

Physical Requirements

May require working in an office, industrial, shipboard, or laboratory environment. Capable of climbing ladders and tolerating confined spaces and extreme temperature variances.

HII is more than a job - it’s an opportunity to build a new future. We offer competitive benefits such as best-in-class medical, dental and vision plan choices; wellness resources; employee assistance programs; Savings Plan Options (401(k)); financial planning tools, life insurance; employee discounts; paid holidays and paid time off; tuition reimbursement; as well as early childhood and post-secondary education scholarships. Bonus/other non-recurrent compensation is occasionally offered for qualified positions, and if applicable to this role will be addressed by the recruiter at the screening phase of application.


Why HII
We build the world’s most powerful, survivable naval ships and defense technology solutions that safeguard our seas, sky, land, space and cyber. Our workforce includes skilled tradespeople; artificial intelligence, machine learning (AI/ML) experts; engineers; technologists; scientists; logistics experts; and business administration professionals.


Recognized as one of America’s top large company employers, we are a values and ethics driven organization that puts people’s safety and well-being first. Regardless of your role or where you serve, at HII, you’ll find a supportive and welcoming environment, competitive benefits, and valuable educational and training programs for continual career growth at every stage of your career.


Together we are working to ensure a future where everyone can be free and thrive.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, physical or mental disability, age, or veteran status or any other basis protected by federal, state, or local law.


Do You Need Assistance?
If you need a reasonable accommodation for any part of the employment process, please send an e-mail to buildyourcareer@hii-co.com and let us know the nature of your request and your contact information. Reasonable accommodations are considered on a case-by-case basis. Please note that only those inquiries concerning a request for reasonable accommodation will be responded to from this email address. Additionally, you may also call 1-844-849-8463 for assistance. Press #3 for HII Mission Technologies.

json.description:
Date: Jul 11, 2025

Location: Pyeongtaek, Gyeonggi, KOR, Humphreys, Korea, Republic of

Company: HII's Mission Technologies division

Requisition Number: 23299

Required Travel: 0 - 10%

Employment Type: Full Time/Salaried/Exempt

Anticipated Salary Range: $93,306.00 - $115,000.00

Security Clearance: TS/SCI

Level of Experience: Senior HI

This opportunity resides with All-Domain Operations (ADO), a business group within HII’s Mission Technologies division. All-Domain Operations comprises multi-domain operations, platforms and logistics, and intelligence operations.

HII designs, develops, integrates and manages the sensors, systems and other assets necessary to support integrated ISR operations and accelerated decision-making. With data fusion and mission management capabilities for the Department of Defense, the combatant commands and the intelligence community, HII advances the mission around the globe.

Meet HII’s Mission Technologies Division
Our team of more than 7,000 professionals worldwide delivers all-domain expertise and advanced technologies in service of mission partners across the globe. Mission Technologies is leading the next evolution of national defense – the data evolution - by accelerating a breadth of national security solutions for government and commercial customers. Our capabilities range from C5ISR, AI and Big Data, cyber operations and synthetic training environments to fleet sustainment, environmental remediation and the largest family of unmanned underwater vehicles in every class. Find the role that’s right for you. Apply today. We look forward to meeting you.

To learn more about Mission Technologies, click here for a short video: https://vimeo.com/732533072

Summary

HII-Mission Technologies is seeking a senior Targeting Analyst to support the United States Forces Korea (USFK), Assistant Chief of Staff, J2 (ACofS, J2) JIOC-K in their mission to provide timely intelligence to Commander, USFK and Combined Forces Command, the combined battle staff, and war fighter component commanders! Come join our growing team today!

What you will do
Develops target nominations, create database records, and database target intelligence products
Researches Target System Analysis to produce these products IAW CJCSI 3370: Physical Description, Target Significance, Expectation, Collateral Damage Concerns, and Functional Characterization Sources
Coordinates with Target Vetting with other combatant commands and with national intelligence agencies
Develops Intermediate Target Development and Target Vetting Trackers
Assists components with submitting Target Development Nominations (TDN) for future vetting nominations
Conducts basic, intermediate and advanced target development).
Studies USFK priorities to make recommendations for Target Development
Produces white papers and briefings to assist J2 leadership with Intermediate Target Development processes
Manages, updates and coordinates USFK target lists in the Joint Targeting Toolbox (JTT) and MIDB to include: Target Folders, Candidate Target List (CTL), No Strike List (NSL), Joint Target List (JTL) and data management procedures
Supports planning efforts with operations and planners
Conducts all-source analysis across target intelligence disciplines, principally focused on air, naval, ground, missile, long range artillery (LRA), command-and-control, SOF, and WMD
Examines links, nodes, vulnerabilities, interdependencies and critical elements on enemy target systems. Synchronize target intelligence assessments
Serves as SME in conferences, meetings, exercises, and working groups
Identifies intelligence information disparities and collection requirements to fill intelligence gaps
Assists the development and the dissemination of Target Management SOP
Additional duties as assigned or required
What we are looking for
5 years relevant experience with Bachelors in related field; 3 years relevant experience with Masters in related field; 0 years experience with PhD or Juris Doctorate in related field; or High School Diploma or equivalent and 9 years relevant experience
Able to surge support during 2 exercises per year
Clearance: Must possess and maintain a TS/SCI clearance, with the continued ability to obtain a Poly
Bonus points for...
Bachelors with 8 years of experience
Recent applicable experience within the last 2 years
Intelligence experience and/or operation support in Korea or other active theaters
Experience in building targets
Experience with the bi-lateral (ROK-US) Korean environment
Familiar with the Status of Forces Agreement (SOFA)
Physical Requirements
May require working in an office, industrial, shipboard, or laboratory environment. Capable of climbing ladders and tolerating confined spaces and extreme temperature variances.

HII is more than a job - it’s an opportunity to build a new future. We offer competitive benefits such as best-in-class medical, dental and vision plan choices; wellness resources; employee assistance programs; Savings Plan Options (401(k)); financial planning tools, life insurance; employee discounts; paid holidays and paid time off; tuition reimbursement; as well as early childhood and post-secondary education scholarships. Bonus/other non-recurrent compensation is occasionally offered for qualified positions, and if applicable to this role will be addressed by the recruiter at the screening phase of application.

Why HII
We build the world’s most powerful, survivable naval ships and defense technology solutions that safeguard our seas, sky, land, space and cyber. Our workforce includes skilled tradespeople; artificial intelligence, machine learning (AI/ML) experts; engineers; technologists; scientists; logistics experts; and business administration professionals.

Recognized as one of America’s top large company employers, we are a values and ethics driven organization that puts people’s safety and well-being first. Regardless of your role or where you serve, at HII, you’ll find a supportive and welcoming environment, competitive benefits, and valuable educational and training programs for continual career growth at every stage of your career.

Together we are working to ensure a future where everyone can be free and thrive.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, physical or mental disability, age, or veteran status or any other basis protected by federal, state, or local law.

Do You Need Assistance?
If you need a reasonable accommodation for any part of the employment process, please send an e-mail to buildyourcareer@hii-co.com and let us know the nature of your request and your contact information. Reasonable accommodations are considered on a case-by-case basis. Please note that only those inquiries concerning a request for reasonable accommodation will be responded to from this email address. Additionally, you may also call 1-844-849-8463 for assistance. Press #3 for HII Mission Technologies.

json.description:
To get the best candidate experience, please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating efforts.

Job Category

Sales

Job Details

About Salesforce

Salesforce is the #1 AI CRM, where humans with agents drive customer success together. Here, ambition meets action. Tech meets trust. And innovation isn’t a buzzword — it’s a way of life. The world of work as we know it is changing and we're looking for Trailblazers who are passionate about bettering business and the world through AI, driving innovation, and keeping Salesforce's core values at the heart of it all.

Ready to level-up your career at the company leading workforce transformation in the agentic era? You’re in the right place! Agentforce is the future of AI, and you are the future of Salesforce.

Job Details

Salesforce provides a compelling opportunity for Sales Professionals with a proven track record exceeding quota in technology sales. Our goal is to build an organization of intelligent, ambitious, Account Executives committed to our vision of changing the software landscape. With 95% customer satisfaction, a best-in-class CRM/Sales Force Automation tool that reps love to use, and a fiercely loyal customer base, it’s a powerful combination for sales success. Top sales talent across the world join us for or our “change the world” mentality; the opportunity to excel in a fast-paced, performance-based, team atmosphere.

You will be responsible for driving strategic, enterprise-wide sales initiatives into a set of strategic accounts of the largest companies in Korea. Your accounts will be a blend of clients with addition revenue opportunities and prospects. You must be able to forecast sales activity and revenue achievement while creating satisfied and referenceable customers. Very competitive comp plan with tremendous upside earnings potential.

Responsibilities:

To exceed monthly / quarterly sales targets by selling Salesforce solutions into strategic accounts in Korea. You will manage the entire sales process to ensure delivery against key performance metrics, with a strong emphasis on new business sales, while expanding existing accounts.

Territory identification and research, go to market territory strategy and create qualified target account list.

Leads generation with support from inside sales team through cold calling and email campaigns

Pipeline development through a combination of marketing events and working with partners.

Create and maintain a sales pipeline to ensure over-achievement within the designated market sector(s).

Engage with prospect organizations to position Salesforce solutions through strategic value based selling, business case definition, ROI analysis, references and analyst data.

Manage the end to end sales process through engagement of appropriate resources such as Sales Engineers, Professional Services, Executives, Partners etc.

Generate short term results whilst maintaining a long term perspective to maximize overall revenue generation.

Accurate monthly forecasting and revenue delivery.

Required Skills:

Application & Cloud Solution sales experience with + 7 years

Automotive Industry Company coverage experience

Fluent English communication skills

Unleash Your Potential

When you join Salesforce, you’ll be limitless in all areas of your life. Our benefits and resources support you to find balance and be your best , and our AI agents accelerate your impact so you can do your best . Together, we’ll bring the power of Agentforce to organizations of all sizes and deliver amazing experiences that customers love. Apply today to not only shape the future — but to redefine what’s possible — for yourself, for AI, and the world.

Accommodations

If you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Form .

Posting Statement

Salesforce is an equal opportunity employer and maintains a policy of non-discrimination with all employees and applicants for employment. What does that mean exactly? It means that at Salesforce, we believe in equality for all. And we believe we can lead the path to equality in part by creating a workplace that’s inclusive, and free from discrimination. Know your rights: workplace discrimination is illegal. Any employee or potential employee will be assessed on the basis of merit, competence and qualifications – without regard to race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender expression or identity, transgender status, age, disability, veteran or marital status, political viewpoint, or other classifications protected by law. This policy applies to current and prospective employees, no matter where they are in their Salesforce employment journey. It also applies to recruiting, hiring, job assignment, compensation, promotion, benefits, training, assessment of job performance, discipline, termination, and everything in between. Recruiting, hiring, and promotion decisions at Salesforce are fair and based on merit. The same goes for compensation, benefits, promotions, transfers, reduction in workforce, recall, training, and education.
